name: enterprise-playwright-ai
description: Enterprise-level Playwright automation framework with AI integration

scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:ai-layer && npm run setup:api-gateway && npm run setup:web-dashboard
scripts.chromadb:stop: docker stop chromadb && docker rm chromadb
scripts.chromadb:ensure: docker ps -q -f name=chromadb || docker run -d --name chromadb -p 8000:8000 chromadb/chroma:latest
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run chromadb:ensure" "wait-on http://localhost:8000/api/v1/heartbeat && npm run api:dev" "wait-on http://localhost:8000/api/v1/heartbeat && npm run web:dev"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:ai-layer && npm run build:api-gateway && npm run build:web-dashboard

author: Enterprise Playwright AI Team
